channel.title: Comments on: Triple Chocolate Praline Tart

item.title: By: Cobi
item.dc:creator: Cobi
item.description: This looks amazing! I've never made a tart before and suddenly have to make one for a dinner party over the weekend; I thought this one sounded easier than one that completely needed baking - though I'm curious as to what actually holds together the praline to stop it oozing everywhere, given the fact there doesn't seem to be any ingredients to set it, such as eggs... I'm guessing the hazelnuts have some form of structural element, so hopefully it, er, holds up for me. (Perhaps I should stop over thinking things!) ;)
item.content:encoded: This looks amazing! I’ve never made a tart before and suddenly have to make one for a dinner party over the weekend; I thought this one sounded easier than one that completely needed baking – though I’m curious as to what actually holds together the praline to stop it oozing everywhere, given the fact there doesn’t seem to be any ingredients to set it, such as eggs… I’m guessing the hazelnuts have some form of structural element, so hopefully it, er, holds up for me. (Perhaps I should stop over thinking things!) ðŸ˜‰

item.description: Oh wow......that's an creamy and delectable tart........
item.content:encoded: Oh wow……that’s an creamy and delectable tart……..

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Chocolate X 3...just love it...I can almost taste it! Yummie...great pictures as well.
item.content:encoded: Chocolate X 3…just love it…I can almost taste it! Yummie…great pictures as well.

item.title: By: Zoe
item.dc:creator: Zoe
item.description: That's in my never ending pile/list of recipes to make too! (But I need a special occasion for that one) I actually recognised it from the cover before you even said it was from Gourmet Traveler - so you have obviously done a beautiful job!
item.content:encoded:
That’s in my never ending pile/list of recipes to make too! (But I need a special occasion for that one)
I actually recognised it from the cover before you even said it was from Gourmet Traveler – so you have obviously done a beautiful job!

item.title: By: parita

item.description: OMG Anita, m drooling here, thats dangerously sinful tart!
item.content:encoded: OMG Anita, m drooling here, thats dangerously sinful tart!

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: anita. this is STELLAR! seriously, it's completely perfect as far as my eyes are concerned, and i'm fairly positive my taste buds would be satisfied as well. really nicely done!
item.content:encoded: anita. this is STELLAR! seriously, it’s completely perfect as far as my eyes are concerned, and i’m fairly positive my taste buds would be satisfied as well. really nicely done!

item.title: By: Monique
item.dc:creator: Monique
item.description: I am enjoying looking at your posts..and this tart is divine:) I read your home page.. I cannot even imagine what you will be like at my age:) I am 55 and you are light yrs ahead of me! Bravo!
item.content:encoded: I am enjoying looking at your posts..and this tart is divine:) I read your home page.. I cannot even imagine what you will be like at my age:) I am 55 and you are light yrs ahead of me! Bravo!

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: OMG how mouth watering does that tart look?! I can just imagine how decadent it must taste... YUM!
item.content:encoded: OMG how mouth watering does that tart look?! I can just imagine how decadent it must taste… YUM!

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Anita, you have done an amazing job. This looks so decadently rich and delicious. I immediately noticed that cover recipe, too. It is sitting in my pile for later in the year to make. I have strange 'lists' of recipes to make. I wish you could have sent some of the left overs up to me!!!
item.content:encoded: Anita, you have done an amazing job. This looks so decadently rich and delicious. I immediately noticed that cover recipe, too. It is sitting in my pile for later in the year to make. I have strange ‘lists’ of recipes to make. I wish you could have sent some of the left overs up to me!!!
